oracle text: N/A At the beginning of your upkeep, put a sludge counter on Toxic Corp Factory. Then, if there are three or more sludge counters on it, sacrifice it and create three 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield.  (Alternatively, you could have it be "At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts a sludge counter on Toxic Corp Factory. Then, if there are three or more sludge counters on it, sacrifice it and create three 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield.")
